questions.question: Which statement BEST describes the operation of a negative-edge-triggered D flip-flop?

answers.a: The Q output is ALWAYS identical to the CLK input if the D input is HIGH
answers.b: The logic level at the D input is transferred to Q on NGT of CLK
answers.c: The Q output is ALWAYS identical to the D input when CLK = PGT
answers.d: The Q output is ALWAYS identical to the D input
